items.sentence: Tom said something the other night about that.
Tom said that he needed to get some fresh air.
Tom said that he told Mary to do her homework.
Tom said that he was worried about his future.
Tom wondered why there was a dog in his house.
Tom can\'t believe how happy Mary seems to be.
Tom has trouble dealing with people like Mary.
Please take care of our dog while we\'re away.
Tom opened his refrigerator and looked inside.
Tom used to play both baseball and basketball.
